title: The Most Creative Discoveries in Astronomy
speaker: Isabel Angelo
blurb: Astronomers are limited in a way that no other scientific field is - our subjects are billions (sometimes trillions!) of miles away. In order to  gain the understanding of the universe that we have today, astronomers have had to get incredibly creative about the ways they study space. In this show, I'll talk about my favorite creative methods for discovering black holes, planets, gravitational waves, and more!
